header.title: wxAuiNotebookEvent

description.p: This class is used by the events generated by wxAuiNotebook.
This class is derived (and can use functions) from: wxBookCtrlEvent wxNotifyEvent wxCommandEvent wxEvent

section.title: Events
section.p: Use wxEvtHandler:connect/3 with wxAuiNotebookEventType to subscribe to events of this type.

func.fsummary: Returns the currently selected page, or wxNOT_FOUND if none was selected.

desc.p: Returns the currently selected page, or wxNOT_FOUND if none was selected.
Note: under Windows, getSelection/1 will return the same value as getOldSelection/1 when called from the EVT_BOOKCTRL_PAGE_CHANGING handler and not the page which is going to be selected.

func.fsummary: Sets the id of the page selected before the change.

desc.p: Sets the id of the page selected before the change.

func.fsummary: Returns the page that was selected before the change, wxNOT_FOUND if none was selected.

desc.p: Returns the page that was selected before the change, wxNOT_FOUND if none was selected.
